reviews.title: Thin and flexible
reviews.body: This case is great, it is thin and very flexible but also great at protecting the phone. The fit is great and it is easy on and off. I haven't dropped my phone and I don't plan too either so I do not know how well that will protect the phone but I am happy with how it works on the phone.

author.name: ByTworth

reviews.title: Flexible
reviews.body: As of right now I give 5 stars, will change later if needed depending on how this holds up. The case is flexible making it easy to put on and take off so it seems like it will last a good while and not break.

author.name: Tworth

reviews.title: Great case
reviews.body: My husband likes this case, it's easy to hold, not slippery. The texture doesn't show scratches or dirt, he's a little tough on phones.  The buttons and camera holes are all lined up.  Great case

author.name: ByJennifer Sharpe

reviews.title: In love.
reviews.body: I love clear case, because I can place pictures under the case. This one seems like good material and durable, fits perfect and it is not slippery at all, recomended.

author.name: Jennifer Sharpe

reviews.title: Soft cheap case fits well. Gives the phone more grip and protects from dirt and scratches.
reviews.body: Soft cheap case fits well. Gives the phone more grip and protects from dirt and scratches. Squeeze to activate feature works fine.

author.name: ByGuylene325

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.body: Item is exactly as described, lightweight but ads massive durability & protection to your phone! Love it!

author.name: Guylene325

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.body: Love this case! The extra grip is just what my kids need! Fits great!

author.name: BySara

reviews.title: Four Stars
reviews.body: This case is a really nice case. It is really durable and not cheap.

author.name: Sara

reviews.title: Clear and cool
reviews.body: Was a great gift  for a friend! Fits great! He loved it!

author.name: Byl2

reviews.title: Win!
reviews.body: I really like this Google pixel 2 case! I gave it to my son. It works great on his Pixel and it is ultra protective. I love that it's shock proof and I swear it keeps fluids out. He likes that it's clear because he dosnt like the look of cases; so this is a win win for this houshould!

author.name: l2

reviews.title: Clear quality
reviews.body: Flexible and fits snug to phone

author.name: ByDeric

reviews.title: Amazing phone case I like that it is flexible and ...
reviews.body: Amazing phone case I like that it is flexible and I can easily get my phone in and out of. Seems to be very durable and it is well made.

author.name: Deric

reviews.title: Great Material, Great Aesthetics!
reviews.body: This phone case is crystal-clear so it preserves the beautify of the phone and protects it! The finger scanner on the back is also easily accessible with the case on. The microdot finish looks pretty slick as well!

author.name: ByHannabug

reviews.title: simple but you can tell the good quality.
reviews.body: a basic case does all the job. clear, simple but you can tell the good quality.

author.name: Hannabug

reviews.title: Great Pixel 2 Case!
reviews.body: Great quality case, well made, and fits Pixel 2 well. Good value. Would recommend!

author.name: ByRichard Redelman

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.body: Great fit and looks great!

author.name: Richard Redelman

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.body: great for the price, looks like long lasting cover

author.name: Bytony

reviews.title: Clear looks great with my white Pixel 2
reviews.body: Clear looks great with my white Pixel 2. The case adds extra grip, while maintaining a slim profile. Active Edge still works well, maybe even becomes more sensitive, so I had set my setting firmer. My only gripe is that there's a bit of space between the case and the physical buttons, requiring a little extra effort to press the Power/Volume buttons. On the other hand, I guess it makes it harder to accidentally press.

author.name: tony

reviews.title: Easy to put on.
reviews.body: This case was perfect! It was just a clear, flexible case that easily slipped on to the phone. I love that it’s clear because my husband prefers the look of the phone over some of the fancy or boring phone protectors. We also purchased a screen protector since this doesn’t have one, but it covers the rest of the phone just fine. I’m sure this one will last much longer than some of the others we have had in the past.

author.name: ByBrenda

reviews.title: Great case, would recommend to those who need that extra layer of protection
reviews.body: Great case! A little stiff in the first day or so, which can make you open the Google Assistant unexpectedly, but after a couple days it loosens up and it's fantastic. Already saved from a couple short falls off a nightstand so far.

author.name: Brenda

reviews.title: Nice fit
reviews.body: I've bought these band on three different phones and they always fit nicely. The only issue is they turn brown over time but I've had that same problem with all these silcon cases.

author.name: Bydb

reviews.title: The Best clear case
reviews.body: The best clear case I've bought so far, and I have bought many cases for all my phones, but this one has the perfect proportions, it fits well, it does resist scratches although after a while you would see one or two but it does good.  I just bought another one for a Pixel 2 so I would recommend it for any kind of phone.

author.name: db

reviews.title: Pretty cool clear case where you can still see the ...
reviews.body: Pretty cool clear case where you can still see the style of the phone but have it be completely secured at the same time.

author.name: ByRogelio Garcia, Jr

reviews.title: Simple and easy
reviews.body: This is a great simple case to protect my phone with. As long you have a screen protector the phone case works great!!

author.name: Rogelio Garcia, Jr

reviews.title: was easy to put on
reviews.body: Pixel Phone Case feels DURABLE, was easy to put on, had a good feel to it, and seems as if it will protect your phone

author.name: ByKamelia Violette

reviews.title: I love it. It doesn't make the phone more bulky ...
reviews.body: It looks really sharp on my phone. I love it. It doesn't make the phone more bulky at all like I thought.

author.name: Kamelia Violette

reviews.title: Love that this case is not slippery and feels durable
reviews.body: Love that this case is not slippery and feels durable! I'll be getting my phone in this week and look forward to seeing how it holds up.

author.name: ByAlisha burk

reviews.title: Highly functional case at a low price
reviews.body: I am pleased with my purchase.Looks exactly as the pictures show,It fits perfectly and the grip is good.The case is very clear with no blemishes, fits snugly around the phone, all the buttons work and the phone still looks beautiful!But all in all, if you're looking for a clear case for a good price to get the job done this is it.

author.name: Alisha burk

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.body: Survived the jaws of my dog so it passes my expectations

author.name: Bysadie ross

reviews.title: Four Stars
reviews.body: Good fit and clear one but the only issue is side buttons become very hard to press.

author.name: sadie ross

reviews.title: Great phone protector!
reviews.body: Love this case.I wasn't sure about the feel of the case at first, thought it might be slippery, but I've been carrying it around to make sure, no drops.Doesn't make my phone look bulky, but has enough protection coverage from drops.It fits the description exactly,,just what I was looking for.I've only had it a couple days, but so far it's an excellent value for the $$.

author.name: ByNicholas M.

reviews.title: Nice case, great price!
reviews.body: Fits great, looks good on the phone, and feels sturdy.They make a good product and serves its purpose.I really like this case. It's exactly what I expected.I was worried that the case would bubble...IT DIDNT'T! This case fit perfectly, and it showcases the phone.Always a better value with a good assortment to choose from.Love it. So far provides great protection

author.name: Nicholas M.

reviews.title: Nice phone case
reviews.body: This Pleson Clear Case is nice.  It it's flexiable but easy to grip.  It seems to be pretty durable.  It is clear but it does have a small amount of fexture to it.  I think it will hold up nice. The side buttons work well too.  Happy with the price.

author.name: ByAlex

reviews.title: Great phone case
reviews.body: Great phone case, extremely durable. Good quality. Don't have to worry about it snapping or breaking when I drop my phone...which is a lot. Happy with this purchase and definitely intend to order from this seller again!

author.name: Alex

reviews.title: Good purchase for the price
reviews.body: The product was good but it would leave a lots of fingerprints. I had to return it and I bought a different case from Amazon.(https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0753CKVBJ/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_3).

author.name: ByBrooke Jacobson
